name: Hana Yori Dango: Another Love Story
overview: Hana Yori Dango: Another Love Story is a romance adventure game based on the Japanese manga, Boys Over Flowers on Game Boy Color. It was published by TDK Core on July 27, 2001. The game was announced in the seventh issue of Margaret in March 2001. The plot of the game is based on the first twelve volumes of the manga. The player plays as Boys Over Flowers heroine Tsukushi Makino. A prologue explains the events up to chapter eight of the manga. Like an otome, the player can choose a character to date, one of F4 members for example. Their relationship with the character determines the ultimate outcome. The storyline wraps up with the Teen of Japan contest. There are a total of nine chapters in the game.
